text: Charles Martin Smith (born October 30, 1953) is an American actor, writer, and director. He is known for his roles in American Graffiti (1973), The Buddy Holly Story (1978), Never Cry Wolf (1983), Starman (1984), The Untouchables (1987), Deep Cover (1992), And the Band Played On (1993), Speechless (1994) and Deep Impact (1998).Charles Martin Smith Biography (1953â€“) and for directing the films Air Bud (1997), Dolphin Tale (2011), and writing and directing the films The Snow Walker (2003), Stone of Destiny (2008) and Dolphin Tale 2 (2014).
